review: If you are wanting to play the games you must get the controller, most of the games do not work with the remote alone. I also didn't like that it doesn't pull it's power from the tv. The plug is so large we can't plug it in behind the tv, so after working so hard to hide the cords we now have one hanging out. Other than that it's exactly what i expected it to be.
